We Welcome Your Referrals

Because we limit our practice to representing people who have been injured physically or financially through the fault of another, we are often called upon by lawyers who do not specialize in these areas to assist their clients. We welcome referrals from lawyers who may not have the time, resources or expertise to pursue cases in our chosen areas of practice.

We are permitted to divide fees with referring lawyers, consistent with and pursuant to the provisions of Professional Conduct Rule 1.5 (e). This is accomplished without any additional charge or fee to the client. We value the input of referring lawyers and appreciate their involvement.

We welcome your referrals and look forward to working with you and your clients.
